system.descriptionText: +5 Strength, +5 Toughness, -5 Willpower, -5 Fellowship. Gain Survival Skill, Melee Weapon Training (Primitive) and either Jaded or Resistance(Poisons) Talent. -10 to all Interaction Skills in Formal Surroundings, +10 to resist Pinning and Shock.
